sqlMap.select: select * from franchiseeModule where b_key = #b_key# and m_check = 1;
select * from franchiseeModule where b_key = #b_key# and m_name = #m_name#;
select m_name from franchiseeModule where b_key = #b_key# order by m_check = true desc;
sqlMap.update: update franchiseeModule set m_check = false where m_check = true and b_key = #b_key#;
update franchiseeModule set m_check = true where m_name = #m_name# and b_key = #b_key#;
sqlMap.delete: delete from franchiseeModule where m_name = #m_name# and b_key = #b_key#;
sqlMap.update: update franchiseeModule set module = #module#, menu = #menu# where m_name = #m_name# and b_key = #b_key#;
sqlMap.select: select * from module where num = (select max(num) from module);
